original_text: They have wandered as blind men in the streets, they have polluted themselves with blood, so that men could not touch their garments.
korean_text: 그들이 거리 거리에서 맹인 같이 방황함이여 그들의 옷들이 피에 더러워졌으므로 그들이 만질 수 없도다

sentences.original_text: They have wandered as blind men
they have polluted themselves with blood
so that men could not touch their garments
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그들의 옷을 만지지 못하게 되었다
